testcases.Name: Addition: -802 + -265
testcases.Body:
Test Name: Addition: -802 + -265

Preconditions:
- Calculator is launched
- Standard mode is selected
- Memory is cleared

Test Steps:
1. Enter -802
2. Press +
3. Enter -265
4. Press =

Expected Result:
- Display shows -1067
